title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Code Review
description: Gather and document the requirements for the CodeHealthMonitor project. This includes specifying the types of codebases to be analyzed (e.g., programming languages such as Python, Java, JavaScript, open-source projects, in-house applications), the metrics to be used for technical debt quantification (code complexity, maintainability, test coverage, security vulnerabilities, and performance issues), desired output formats for reports and recommendations (HTML, PDF, CSV, API, and integrations with popular IDEs), and any additional project constraints or considerations such as scalability, privacy concerns, and internationalization. Upon completion, the document will serve as a guide for the development team. For further improvements, consider adding sections on collaboration features, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) integration, and long-term maintenance strategies.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the CodeHealthMonitor system, including the components for code analysis, data storage, reporting, and user interface.

title: Implement Code Analysis Module
description: Develop the module responsible for analyzing codebases and identifying technical debt based on predefined metrics and rules.

title: Implement Data Storage and Retrieval
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for storing and retrieving code analysis results and related metadata.

title: Develop Reporting and Visualization
description: Create the user interface and reporting components for presenting code analysis results, technical debt metrics, and improvement recommendations in a clear and actionable manner.

title: Implement Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up the continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the CodeHealthMonitor project, including automated testing, build, and deployment processes.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the CodeHealthMonitor system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities and ensure data privacy and integrity.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the CodeHealthMonitor system, covering installation, configuration, usage, and maintenance.

title: Perform System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Conduct thorough testing of the CodeHealthMonitor system, including functional, integration, and performance testing, to ensure high quality and reliability.
